dict.string: Format new macros and deleted macros to fit template
Prepare new and deleted macros for report
Extract a list of all unlabeled macros in all groups

SELECT mn.Group_Name, mn.Macro_Name, mn.Macro_ID, mn.Group_ID, go.Group_Name AS Old_Group_Name FROM macros_new mn LEFT JOIN groups_old go ON mn.Group_ID = go.Group_ID WHERE mn.Macro_Status IS NULL OR mn.Macro_Status = '';

array.string: Extract all unlabeled macros in all groups, with old group name too

dict.string: Get the count of matching macros

array.string: Count all macros without a status in all groups

dict.string: Add it to the list of items in the modified section of the report - we don't include this section, though
Update the status of all modified macros
Remove last comma from list of SQL updates

array.string: Update status on all modified macros in modified groups analysis

dict.string: Get list of groups with modified macros
SELECT DISTINCT grn.Group_Name FROM macros_new mn JOIN groups_new grn ON mn.Group_ID = grn.Group_ID WHERE mn.Macro_Status = 'modified';

array.string: Extract list of groups with modified macros

dict.string: Apply modified label (if setting enabled) to groups with modified macros
Processed all macros without a known status
Remove last backup's 'modified macros' file (if it exists) and create the new one
Check for prior file before trying to delete
Save a list of modified macros to a file for comparison work
Process the moved, renamed, and moved-and-renamed macros
Extract full list of moved, renamed, etc. (plus in renamed groups) macros

SELECT mn.Group_Name, mn.Macro_Name, mo.Group_Name AS Old_Group_Name, mo.Macro_Name AS Old_Macro_Name FROM macros_new mn LEFT JOIN macros_old mo ON mn.Macro_ID = mo.Macro_ID WHERE mn.Macro_Status IN ('moved', 'renamed', 'movedrenamed', 'grouprenamed');

array.string: Extract moved, renamed, moved and renamed macros

dict.string: Get the count of matching macros
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM macros_new WHERE Macro_Status = 'moved' OR Macro_Status='renamed' OR Macro_Status='movedrenamed' OR Macro_Status='grouprenamed'

array.string: Count moved, renamed, and moved and renamed macros
